ref: 9295 busta m. ʻ burnt exterior of roast meat, husks or shell of fruit ʼ lex. [Cf. busa -- ʻ chaff ʼ; and *buttha -- ʻ defective ʼ?]
Pk. bhutthalla -- ʻ waste food thrown to cats ʼ;
B. bhut(u)ṛī ʻ entrails, contents of jackfruit &c. ʼ, (Dacca) bothā ʻ inedible inside portion of a jackfruit ʼ ODBL 515.
